tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (FRAG (NP (NP (NN @CP3) (NN Best) (NN thing)) (SBAR (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP 've) (VP (VBN heard) (NP (NP (DT all) (NN day)) (ADJP (RB #family) (NP-TMP (CD 1st)))))))))))
